mapper.select: SELECT f.feed_id, f.contents, f.location, f.created_at, f.writer_user_id ,u.user_id AS userId, u.pic, u.created_at AS createdAt, u.uid, u.nick_name AS nickName , fl.feed_id IS NOT NULL AS isLike FROM user u INNER JOIN feed f ON f.writer_user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN feed_like fl ON fl.feed_id = f.feed_id AND fl.user_id = #{signedUserId} LEFT JOIN ( SELECT feed_id, COUNT(*) AS like_count FROM feed_like GROUP BY feed_id ) fl_f ON fl_f.feed_id = f.feed_id WHERE f.writer_user_id = #{profileId} GROUP BY f.feed_id ORDER BY f.feed_id DESC LIMIT #{startIdx}, #{size}
